task.title: Inserting Symbols from External DTD Subset

context.p: You can insert symbols that are listed as internal entities in the template-specific external DTD subset.
To insert a symbol from the external DTD subset, do the following:

step.cmd: Select symbols of the external DTD subset.

info.p: On the Choose Internal Entity pane, click the Symbols (External DTD Subset) subtree.
The Symbols (External DTD Subset) subtree shows symbols declared as internal entities in a DTD file that is external to the edited document.
In the selected subtree, click the symbol to insert.
The Entity Content pane shows the selected symbol.
To insert the selected symbol, click OK.
